title: Charming 4-Bedroom Duplex with Cozy Family Spaces in Heart of Lazarz
description: Welcome to a beautifully appointed duplex offering 4 sunny bedrooms and 3 full bathrooms across 146 sqm of comfortable living space. The open-plan living room adjoins a modern kitchen with dining space, leading out to a sunny balcony overlooking a peaceful leafy courtyard. Enjoy the luxury of a dedicated home office, perfect for hybrid working, and smart touches like motion-sensor exterior lights. Practical solutions include ample in-unit storage and access to a residents-only swimming pool.
neighborhood_description: Located in family-friendly Lazarz, this home is surrounded by green parks, artist studios, and vibrant cafes and bistros. Well-known for its warm community appeal and excellent schools, Lazarz also offers direct access to public transport and convenient bike lines, making commuting and explore-go easy for the entire family.
lifestyle_benefits: proximity to local markets and dining
target_buyer: Ideal for busy families with children who value comfort, community, and flexibility of a home office while being close to city amenities.
market_positioning: A rarely available, spacious duplex in sought-after Lazarz, competitively priced for families desiring space, modern conveniences, and access to excellent local facilities in a welcoming artistic neighborhood.
